channel.title: MATH on Katherine's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in MATH on Katherine's Blog

item.title: Linear algebra note - Gilbert Strang
item.description: This is my personal note of linear algebra. I will be continuously updating the PDF file. It’s kinda huge work, hopefully I can achieving it little by little everyday. It is hosted on github with latex source code: https://github.com/QiKatherine/Linear-algebra/blob/master/1.pdf

item.title: Deduction of Poisson process 【泊松过程推导】
item.description: A straightforward deduction of poisson process. 一份简单明了的泊松过程推导。 1. Reasoning 2. Expected value and Variance
